code: import{applyMiddleware,combineReducers,compose,createStore}from"redux";import thunk from"redux-thunk";import searcherReducer from"./searcherDuck";var rootReducer=combineReducers({searcher:searcherReducer});var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var generateStore=function generateStore(){var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));return store;};export default generateStore;
